concept.title: Using PDX Serialization
concept.shortdesc: To use PDX serialization, you can configure and use vFabric GemFire's reflection-based autoserializer, or you can program the serialization of your objects by using the PDX interfaces and classes.

conbody.p: Optionally, program your application code to deserialize individual fields out of PDX representations of your serialized objects. You may also need to persist your PDX metadata to disk for recovery on startup.
